### Introduction

Kallan is a Master of Public Health Candidate in Epidemiology with a certificate in Applied Biostatistics and Public Health Data Science at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health. Her interests include infectious disease, chronic disease, epidemiological methods, and data analysis. 

Prior to Mailman, she worked as a Clinical Laboratory Technologist in the Mycology/Mycobacteriology Laboratory at Mayo Clinic. Kallan graduated from the University of Michigan with a Bachelor of Science in Microbiology and a minor in Applied Statistics. 

During her free time, Kallan enjoys long walks and listening to classical music.
